Plot: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo, all the while ...
Title: Behind the Mask: The Rise of Leslie Vernon
Actors: Nathan Baesel, Angela Goethals, Robert Englund, Scott Wilson
tomatoConsensus: A smart mockumentary that presents a gory, funny, and obviously affectionate skewering of the slasher genre.
